data.title: Send money to Montenegro
data.meta_description: Get fast transfers at competitive rates when you send money to Montenegro online with US dollars. Quick and secure online money transfers with 24/7 phone support.
data.text:
Fast and secure transfers at competitive rates when you send money to Montenegro from USA. Transfer today.

Make or track payments day or night with our intuitive, secure digital platform

24/7 customer support

FinCEN and state regulated

Scroll to explore

OFX offers customised rates for high-value transfers and corporate customers. Register or login to get an OFX customised rate. Occasionally, a third-party intermediary or bank may deduct a fee from the value of your transfer. This fee may vary and OFX receives no portion of it.

What is the best way to send money to Montenegro from the USA?

When you transfer money to Montenegro with OFX the easiest option is Direct Debit. The agreed amount will be withdrawn from your nominated account and then sent to your recipient.

Otherwise, you can send a wire transfer (bank fees apply) and make your payment online or in-branch.

Please note that payment methods vary based on the currency being sent. Once you lock in your transfer, we will inform you of available payment options.

Currency tools that could help you save

What’s driving the US dollar right now?

Get up-to-date currency market insights from our OFXperts. It could help you save on your next money transfer to Montenegro.

Your rate to send money to Montenegro now

Need to send money now? Check your customer rate based on the live market.

USD/EUR exchange rates

Not sure how the current market exchange rate for European euros stacks up? Review past performance for your currency pair.

Rate alerts for euros

Want to know the best time to transfer to Montenegro? Set up a Rate Alert for your currency pair and we’ll let you know if the rate hits.

FAQs

Can I send money to Montenegro with a mobile app?

Yes, you can send money to Montenegro using the OFX app available on Android and iOS. Download the app now.

Can I send money from an American bank account to Montenegro?

OFX can transfer funds to almost any bank in Montenegro, including, but not limited to:

How can I send money to a friend in Montenegro from the USA?

Whether it’s a gift or a lifeline, when you transfer with OFX we can send money straight to your friend’s bank account.

They don’t need to sign up with OFX, all they have to do is share their bank account details with you.

What verification details do I need to provide as a US resident?

Verification helps keep our platform safe from fraud, so we verify the identity of every person who requests an OFX account.

To verify your identity you’ll need your passport, driver’s license or identity card, as well as your social security number.

If you’re making a business money transfer, we’ll also ask for your business registration number. industry, and other additional documentation relevant to your business structure.

Is there any limit on how much money I can send to Montenegro from the US?

OFX does not enforce any limits on the amount of money you may wish to transfer to Montenegro.

Can I send money from Montenegro to the USA?

Yes, OFX can send money from Montenegro to the USA.
